events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that occurred on a busy intersection involving their vehicle.
The submitted claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the details of the vehicle collision.
A claims agent was assigned promptly to the case to ensure personalized assistance for the policyholder.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the customer confirming receipt and next steps in the process.
Request sent to the customer for submission of police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
The customer provided all requested documents including detailed photos of the damaged vehicle and repair quotes.
Investigation team commenced reviewing evidence and police report to verify damage cause and extent.
Investigation confirmed the accident circumstances matched the claim details; no discrepancies found.
A fair settlement amount covering vehicle repair costs was proposed to the policyholder for approval.
Positive feedback received from customer approving the proposed settlement and expressing satisfaction.
Formal approval of the claim was granted following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Settlement payment was processed and issued to the customer's designated account swiftly and securely.
The claim case was officially closed after confirmation that the customer received and acknowledged payment.
